message.body: why was today wonderful?

so many things! i got a couple packages in the mail, painted my nails perfectly, and woke up to a text from andrew saying that he'd obtained a car for this weekend, which was something he was concerned about. plus we got 3rd place at trivia just the four of us, and i contributed a lot! also it was someone's birthday on one of the other teams and they gave everyone good humor bars. and i finished watching weeds!
and i got to answer a fun emory question on tumblr.
that does sound great. i hope you're all set to go tomorrow...just don't forget the dentist.
but on a less happy note...james and i are no longer seeing each other.
last night was our *last* night.
oh no! even after this weekend? are you okay? (unrelatedly: dad wants to know how your grass is.)
i'm not very ok, but thanks. a problem with mara emerged after the weekend. we agreed that he needs to concentrate on that relationship. we both cried pretty much all night. it sucks.
i'm the one who made the call, but he didn't argue so i know he knew it's the right thing.
my grass is growing, but not terrible. yet.
aw. :( i'm glad it was a "good", mature breakup reason and not something between you two.

right. the two of us were awesome. i just couldn't stand to see him unhappy and worried. if he puts his all into monogamy with her and it fails, he knows where i am. but i hope whatever makes him happiest works itself out.
that's a good attitude to have, even though it probably doesn't make it hurt less now.
yeah, i'll be honest...i'm pretty miserable. anyway, enough of that. congrats on your good day. i'm going to bed so i can be at the dentist early. sweet dreams. ily!
ily2! sleep well!
did dot say who they are planning to have play in the finals on sat?
no. :(
how was the dentist?
no cavities! the hygienist suggests that i get my lower wisdom teeth removed at some point.
yay, you! congratulations! just lower, huh? have fun and be safe this weekend. lots of snaps and updates!! ily!
apparently the lower ones are crooked-er so it traps food, which could cause cavities on my regular teeth. and for sure! love you!
how about austin from sat july 20 to tue july 23? or would you rather wait til july 31 to aug 3?
no preference, whatever works best for you!
made it here safe!
